titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Congressional Railroad Survey map 1853
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by CPNWS staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Western Washington University, Center for Pacific Northwest Studies

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Rozlind Koester 2012
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS ( Describing Archives: A Content Standard).

origination.corpname: United States--Congress--Joint Congressional Committee on the Investigation of the Northern Pacific Railroad Land Grants

did.abstract: The collection consists of one Congressional Railroad Survey map covering the Milk River to the Columbia River.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of one Congressional Railroad Survey map covering the Milk River to the Columbia River.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to the public.

prefercite.p: Congressional Railroad Survey map, Center for Pacific Northwest Studies, Western Libraries Archives & Special Collections, Western Washington University, Bellingham WA 98225-9123.

processinfo.head: About Harmful Language and Content

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.
